div.head: Welcome to Rice University's digital scholarship archive
div.p: This is Rice's institutional repository, a web site where the university's intellectual output is shared, managed, searched, and preserved. Most materials come from Rice faculty members' research, electronic theses and dissertations, and digitized collections of rare or unique books, images, musical performances, and manuscripts. The archive runs on DSpace, an open source software package.
Do you have questions about this archive? Read our FAQ.
